    Opens the user's booking history csv file and extract the information Prints out all user's booking history information such as booking ID, movie name, cineplex, cinema, movie date and time, ticket seat and cost, transaction date and time and total amount paid

    Method parameters in managers with type arguments of type Account
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    AccountManager.checkAccountExists(List<Account> accountList, String username)
    Checks if the account exists inside the accounts.csv file based on the particular username
    boolean
    AccountManager.checkAccountExistsAndCustomer(List<Account> accountList, String username)
    Checks if the customer account exists inside the accounts.csv file based on the particular username
    boolean
    AccountManager.checkLogin(List<Account> accountList, String username, String password)
    Checks login details by checking whether the username and password exists in the database, accounts.csv
    CustomerAcc
    CustomerAccManager.createAcc(List<Account> accountList)
    Function to create new user account Asks user for username and checks if username already exist in the list of accounts Ask user for email and checks if email entered is a valid email address using pre-defined regex function in accountManager class Ask user for mobile number and check if mobile number entered is a valid number using pre-defined regex function in accountManager class Ask user for age and check if age is valid Ask user for password and check if password is strong using function in utils/PasswordStrengthChecker class After getting information, all the information will be stored in acc and appended to the csv file with the list of accounts
    boolean
    StaffAccManager.createStaffAccount(List<Account> accountList)
    Function to create new staff account Checks for empty username input and whether the username already exists Checks if the email is valid according to pre-defined regex function in AccountManager class Checks if the mobile number is valid according to pre-defined regex function in AccountManager class Checks if the age is valid.
    Account
    AccountManager.getAccount(List<Account> accountList, String username, String password)
    Fetches the account inside the accounts.csv file based on the particular username and the password
    int
    StaffAccManager.removeStaffAccount(List<Account> accountList)
    Function to remove staff account Checks whether the username exists Removal of staff account only allowed for super admin
    boolean
    StaffAccManager.updateAccountListCSV(List<Account> accountList)
    Writes the list of accounts to the accounts.csv file for storage
